solution_line_template: First add up the calories from all three meals: {lunch_calories} + {breakfast_calories} + {dinner_calories} = <<{lunch_calories}+{breakfast_calories}+{dinner_calories}={total_calories}>>{total_calories}
Then subtract Jacob's goal from the number of calories he actually ate: {total_calories} - {calorie_goal} = <<{total_calories}-{calorie_goal}={over_calories}>>{over_calories}
